sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NOTICE_SEQ, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_DATE, MANAGER_ID ) VALUES ( notice_seq.nextval, #notice_title#, #notice_content#, sysdate, 'ourbox' )
SELECT NOTICE_SEQ.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM NOTICE WHERE 1=1
AND NOTICE_TITLE LIKE '%' || #notice_title# || '%'
AND NOTICE_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #notice_content# || '%'
ORDER BY NOTICE_SEQ DESC
sqlMap.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_TITLE=#notice_title#, NOTICE_CONTENT=#notice_content# WHERE NOTICE_SEQ = #notice_seq#
sqlMap.select:
select A.* from ( select rownum as rnaum, B.* from ( select * from notice order by notice_seq desc ) B
where rownum <= #end# ) A where rnaum >= #start#
